body.name: BLACK+DECKER Cord Reel Iron with Nonstick Soleplate, ICR16X
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 21 hrs 56 mins
FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: TrueGlide Soleplate: The nonstick soleplate provides a 2x smoother glide on all fabric types
Cord Reel: The spring-loaded cord unreels and retracts quickly for easy use and storage
Fabric Guide: Find the perfect temperature for all fabric types with the convenient guide printed on the top of the iron
Anti-Drip: This feature eliminates pesky water spotting by properly heating water before it enters the steam chamber
body.description: The BLACK + DECKER Xpress Steam Cord Reel Iron takes the stress out of garment care. SmartSteam Technology gives you total control in one dial, with temperature and steam settings for all types of fabrics. Vertical steam lets you blast away wrinkles from clothes on the hanger or from drapes. Plus, the spring-loaded cord reel prevents tangling and takes the hassle out of storage.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SmartSteam Technology Get the perfect setting every time. Select how much steam you'll need for each job, whether it’s at on the ironing board or vertical on a hanger. TrueGlide Soleplate The nonstick soleplate provides a 2x smoother glide on all fabric types. Cord Reel The spring-loaded cord unreels and retracts quickly for easy use and storage. Fabric Guide Find the perfect temperature for all fabric types with the convenient guide printed on the top of the iron.

Anti-Drip This feature eliminates pesky water spotting by properly heating water before it enters the steam chamber. Vertical Steam Surge Blast away tough wrinkles with the steam surge, which also works vertically for steaming drapes and clothes on the hanger. Spray Mist Push-button controls to make ironing convenient and quick. 3-Way Auto Shutoff Get peace of mind from motion-sensitive technology that shuts off the iron if it’s not being used. Anti-Drip Vertical Steam Surge Spray Mist 3-Way Auto Shutoff

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great product and price
reviews.reviewText: love that it is so lightweight, heats up quickly and lots of steam

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this iron it heats up fast and the cord isn't everywhere you press a button at the bottom and it just rolls back in it works best when its filled with water verses when the water is running low

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Black Decker Iron gone in 35 days
reviews.reviewText: Overall I am satisfied with the product even i faced a major problem.The problem was that it stopped working after 35 days. This was a big disappointment because i was over 5 days of my 30 days return time. Amazon refused to accommodate and they asked me to contact the vendor. And contacting the vendor for warranty was another big hassle, after almost 20 calls i was able to take hold of someone who was actually responsible of handling warranty claims.At first she asked me to pay $12 as delivery charges for a $19 Iron but then she realized it is not fair so she sent replacement of my iron in warranty free of cost.Masha Allah, it is working fine since then.Update: The Iron again gone bad at the end of December 2023. Since it was in the warranty so i contacted them again for the warranty claim. They accepted the claim and like the last time they asked to pay delivery charges but after the same argument they waived off the delivery charges.Since it has gone bad two times during the warranty so the quality is not so good. The edge is it is under warranty so got it replaced.Now Overall i am not satisfied with the performance/ quality.Suggestion: Simplify your warranty procedure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice to use
reviews.reviewText: I like how the pointed end is rounded off, no more driving into seams when I'm feeling energetic!The safety feature! An unusual story that turns out well.One time I used it, it would not heat up though the light was on. I tried many times. Then I saw a bug crawling on it. Honestly, I think he had been inside exploring. I captured and put him outside the house. The following day I used the iron as usual and it was perfect.Happy the bug benefitted from the safety feature (though I do not know how he fared outside) and my new iron did not get ruined!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pros: The cable cord is retractable which I loved since save you space and helps to keep it better while you storage it.Cons: The vapor does not come out like in a good way when you use it vertically or maybe is just my expectation, also you cannot even fill it up until the maximum level indicated since the water drops out of the iron, it needs to be lower than the maximum level.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great clothes iron
reviews.reviewText: We bought this to replace our very old Black and Decker iron. It works really great. I've even used the steam function to steam out wrinkles on no-iron clothes. The cord reel is one of the best features since it just disappears into the iron.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not a great value
reviews.reviewText: Doesn't heat up consistently, spits a lot, cord stopped reeling after several months - can't return it - thry won't fix it warranty it etc - tossed it - bought a cheap one at Walmart that does 10x better

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the style, the color, the ease of working it it’s worth the money
